title: LinkMe
description: A Linktree clone built with Vue.js, Tailwind, Nest.js & MongoDB.
features: Users can submit personal links with an added caption & also edit them.
Each user has a personal profile page with thier added styles & links.

title: Forumly
description: A Social Media/Forum platform where users can connect & interact with each other.
features: Users can follow each other & recieve a customized feed.
User can create blogs, threads, posts, comments & follow other users.

title: FunWithGPT-3
description: Web application built for Shopify Frontend Developer Challenge that utilizes OpenAI's API.
features: User can select from 4 AI engines to use.
Generates a list of songs based off of emoji selection.
Generates travel tips based off a city, state input. Can also generate a random location.

title: MealDishr
description: A meal generator application that provides you with meal instructions, measurements & a video on how to prepare the meal of your choice.
features: Detailed instuctions on each meal along with a youtube link.
Wide variety of options to choose from.
Offers a button to randomly generate a meal.

title: Twitch Search
description: A search bar that utilizes the Twitch API to search a twitch user and return their display name & follower count.
features: Built on a node server that serves a proxy to handle requests to Twitch Server.
Use sqlite to store search results & node cache to handle subsequent searches.
UI components to handle loading state & errors.

title: Personal Site
description: Personal portfolio website that also acts a blog.
features: Fully responsive on all screen sizes.
Able to host my personal blog as well as display previous work.
Resusable components to easily display new work.
